'''''Paxillus vernalis''''' is a [[basidiomycete]] [[fungus]] found in montane forests in northern North America. It closely resembles ''[[Paxillus involutus]]''. The fungus was [[species description|described]] as new to science by Scottish mycologist [[Roy Watling]] in 1969.<ref name="Watling 1969"/>
